column3: “In 2009 I was told I had a brain tumor that showed up on an x-ray and then refused any other medical treatment figuring it was time to go....I did some research and was told G13 Haze was the most potent THC % there was and I found some....In 2010 I had an MRI with and without contrast, They couldn't find any sign that the tumor ever existed....Now it's almost 2015 and I'm still here......”

“G13 Haze is a legendary strain subject to much rumour and speculation. It has been proclaimed as the strongest strain ever created and some say it was genetically engineered by the US government in a secret CIA lab. Whether or not these rumours are true
column4: there is no doubt that this is one of the strongest strains available today with very high levels of THC and buds glistening with resin. This hybrid of G13 has been...”"

column3: “Was recommended to me as a day starter strain and was absolutely amazing.  I suffer from MS and am a indica user to the max.  I seldom use anything except before bed, but this strain was great.  Kept me mentally focused, but relaxed...then turned into a great body pain reliever.  I could also not believe how long the effects lasted!  Now my one and only Hybrid that I will use again.”

“I'm from the Netherlands and quite recently I had some legally grown G13 Haze from a coffeeshop (one of my friends had bought it). Dutch weed is usually stronger than foreign weed, and I had been informed that this was high quality marijuana. After smoking it, I felt awesome. It felt as if I was flying, and everytime I moved, I felt as if I was being electrocuted, but in a nice way. My body felt completely relaxed, b...”

“They aren't lying when they say this is a medicinal strain. G13 Haze is a heavy hitter with relief to many things. This strain is not one for beginners.

Fast onset that starts in the head followed by a nice body numbing feeling. I believe this could help treat almost anything with related to pain. 

I could see this strain being overwhelming for beginners or those who smoke too much of this strain. I vaped a little ...”
“excellent smoke.....tasty lemon hash flavor .....mine turned purple a bit,which added to the frosty look......started 12/12...ended up with 3 1/2 oz's....a re-do for sure”

“This large gram bud is leafy, red hairs form in clustering foxtails tapering around the uprising of this massive chunky bud. Calyx's hide behind the saturated dark red hairs, pop out with super sticky resin on each leaf. The CBG aroma reminds me of pungent pine with hints of citrus. Vaping this beauty at 190C˚ It's thick vapor of the THC is so heavy n thick I can barely see the L.E.D lights through this turky bag.
Th...”

“A heavy dreamy euphoria ensues shortly after smoking and gradually mellows out into a happy relaxation. Though the thing that really made this strain stand out from the others is the things it does to your thought process . You can just sit down and think about everything with a new perspective. All the while your body is tingling like never before (That's probably the G13 part). If you've ever heard of High Epiphan...”"
“The strain I had was G13 x Super Silver Haze. It is by far one of my most favorite strains. You can imagine the taste and smell considering the strains lineage. A+ bud.”

“I Vaped This strain and in Minutes it hit me I didnt even Finish, Such A Nice Smelling Strain The Haze Almost over Powers The Whole Strain. G13 Diesel Is Actually One Of My Favorites G13 Haze Is Good to Thou”

“G13 feels amazing with that glorious Haze. It comes out to be a really balanced hybrid. Earthy musk and the sweet haze entice the nose piece.  This works so well in the afternoon, but can be versatile just as much. The bud structure really has that sativa stretch. I highly recommend.”

“Had this a while back now. I've tried many different strains but the piece of this I had was simply gorgeous, very long colas clarted in THC. The bud was fairly dense and smelt magnificent.

When I fired up a packed pipe of this someone else in the room told me it smelt of Parma Violets, which I'd very much agree with. This one has a very unique, distinct taste that is not easily forgotten.

The high is strong with a...”
“I like this strain, 100% uplifted and euphoric..”
“Takes a long time to grow. Lots of pistils. Very resinous. Earthy flavor. Handles LST & manifolding well. Can get very bushy. Handles heat well.”

“It's a great strain to smoke when you have a small amount - I.e. 1 or 2 hits from a pipe (I once had one hit from a pipe just to get rid of a headache and it worked, I wasn't high, but I was free from the headache). However, when you smoke too much, it because quite overbearing. I had a party at a friends house last night, and had a bunch of hits from this weed through a bong with 4 bottles of Budweiser.

I had an al...”

“Great for relaxing,I have my tea with me and a vaped bag od G-13xHaze, its a major day dream for the first part. then relaxes into the body calmly not rushed in anyway and lasts for hours great for a mellower out and sleepy problems,great for pain with the head high daydream feeling.”

“Had this a while back now. I've tried many different strains but the piece of this I had was simply gorgeous, very long colas clarted in THC. The bud was fairly dense and smelt magnificent.

When I fired up a packed pipe of this someone else in the room told me it smelt of Parma Violets, which I'd very much agree with. This one has a very unique, distinct taste that is not easily forgotten.

The high is strong with a...”
“Probably the best I've ever had. Took one hit before leaving my guys house just for the taste. VERY hard to drive! legs were tensing up like never before. Definite good bud!”
“I like this strain, 100% uplifted and euphoric..”

“Great for relaxing,I have my tea with me and a vaped bag od G-13xHaze, its a major day dream for the first part. then relaxes into the body calmly not rushed in anyway and lasts for hours great for a mellower out and sleepy problems,great for pain with the head high daydream feeling.”
“Found it in Columbus Ohio. Top shelf all the way. Almost like you were floating.  Total body buzz. good Strain to have friends around.”
“Vape only 0.13 gm (that a irony lol) and get high as f_ck! Happy and pleasure had high, focused mind but gently relax body at the same time. If you can - try it.”
“excellent pain reliever for severe chronic pain.”
“absolutely out of control”

“This strain is good for sleep. It will make you every tired and you will soon pass out and make you go into a pleasant dream. Careful though some people have said it makes them groggy in the morning 

Flower smell 😷
Flower tree 😷
Flower high 😴😴”
“Half a brownie made with this strain had me pain free from my DDD for almost a full day. Highly recommended.”
“one of the best strains I've ever smoked. The potent is perfect it's a good high a good relax definitely recommend this to patients that are sick or just to people would want to feel relaxed.”
“I smoke maybe 10 joints a day, strong strains and rarely get stoned like I used to when I was a teenager. Tonight I felt like a teenager again 😎”

“Clear headed pain relief with a pleasant uplifting attitude - The pheno we have has a strong diesel smell with a hint of lemon and pine - Taste is smooth and pleasant when smoked or vaped - Beans from Barney's took around 12 weeks to flower but it is was worth the wait.”
“excellent pain reliever for severe chronic pain.”
“absolutely out of control”

“this was very good smoke.i`ve smoked lots of hazes and hybrids and this one works really well.rolled a medium joint and got pretty baked about half way through it.nice hard buds,sweet smelling and kind of fruity w/ a little earthiness.on me this weed helped everything,pain,anxiety,yada yada!i really liked this strain and will buy it again because it`s good anytime,and i do so love a good wake and bake and it will put...”
“Consumed via Iolite vaporizer and as joints.  Very nice sativa; earthy taste with relaxing, and stress relieving effects.”
“one of the best strains I've ever smoked. The potent is perfect it's a good high a good relax definitely recommend this to patients that are sick or just to people would want to feel relaxed.”

“Haven't smoked this in a few years as I've moved to UK and haven't seen it mentioned once, but stays in my memory as one of the greatest strains I've smoked. Bought from Capricorn in the Netherlands and smoked through the weekend with a few friends, we all chose a strain each and this was mine. The high lasts hours upon hours long, medicating every 30 mins or so gave an insanely heavy couch lock but very comfortable....”
“Great high.  Made me kind of lazy but not chained to the couch.  Very floaty Indica feelings were dominant, but not overwhelming. Very nice.”

“this was very good smoke.i`ve smoked lots of hazes and hybrids and this one works really well.rolled a medium joint and got pretty baked about half way through it.nice hard buds,sweet smelling and kind of fruity w/ a little earthiness.on me this weed helped everything,pain,anxiety,yada yada!i really liked this strain and will buy it again because it`s good anytime,and i do so love a good wake and bake and it will put...”

“Perfect hybrid. The body relaxes due to the indica side of the flower. During this state of relaxness your mind comes completely to rest, making you more comfortable. The sative side of the flowers makes you creative and euphoric, opening your mind in a different way. The perfect strain to relax and have some deed conversations about music and life.”
“This bud has a definite uplifting sativa with some noticable and effective undertones of indica which help a lot with sleeping or just mid-day relaxing.”

“It's a great strain to smoke when you have a small amount - I.e. 1 or 2 hits from a pipe (I once had one hit from a pipe just to get rid of a headache and it worked, I wasn't high, but I was free from the headache).

However, when you smoke too much, it because quite overbearing. I had a party at a friends house last night, and had a bunch of hits from this weed through a bong with 4 bottles of Budweiser. I had an al...”
“Love this bud. One of a kind haze smell, grown aeroponically. One of the best!”

“It's a great strain to smoke when you have a small amount - I.e. 1 or 2 hits from a pipe (I once had one hit from a pipe just to get rid of a headache and it worked, I wasn't high, but I was free from the headache).

However, when you smoke too much, it because quite overbearing. I had a party at a friends house last night, and had a bunch of hits from this weed through a bong with 4 bottles of Budweiser. I had an al...”
“Good chill vibes”

“very dank strain.....i was incredibly happy and uplifted for about 3 hours, it probably would've lasted longer but I fell asleep....also, everything was HILARIOUS, more than usual I think. This fucks you up in a good way, but it took me 3 tries to roll a mediocre joint........hahha”
“It's real chill" - my wife”"

“for me it kinda it nice and relaxing and i get uplifted and feel at peace. it not really good for getting me energetic those when i wake and bake in the morning i still feel sleepy and no munchies so i still have hard time eating breakfast but i think i get them later just not right away. so probably not the best choice for morning. but for me it still works great for my depression.”

“me and a friend smoked about 0.25 each, and we where fine as wine, giglely as hell, and the next morning fresh as a horse, never head a beter workout, really.
about 15:30, i was going to my work, and a man got in the bus (ate a sandwitch ore something) and had a stain on his cheek. i made a gentel gesture too make him aware of it and nobody els noticed it!”

“Great strain, very interesting high. Felt like I was in a pensieve (from harry potter) as in my thoughts were floating around pleasantly and I could access them whenever I want. Lovely. Strong muscle relief too. Definitely recommended for medical consumers, as a recreational user I find the muscle relief exceeds my needs I prefer more pure sativas. Would give it a try again though once in a blue moon, the pondering a...”
“Good chill vibes”
“This bud has a definite uplifting sativa with some noticable and effective undertones of indica which help a lot with sleeping or just mid-day relaxing.”

“Great stuff 
My body's kinda slumped and my brain is on fire 
Great stuff”

“I heard some mad shit about this strain. Things such as it was chemically engineered in CIA labs, etc...

It has a ridiculous amount of THC 27% with the average being something around 12.5% 

It creates a lazy, lethargic feeling but the high is really strong. Dry mouth and paranoia is a downside to this. I’m blessed in the sense that my eyes never change colour no matter how stoned I get but people I have smoked with...”
“Great strain, Very strong haze taste and also can hit you hard like any other pure indica. This is a great strain for a beginner smoker and/or the seasoned smoker looking for a  mellow high.”

“me and a friend smoked about 0.25 each, and we where fine as wine, giglely as hell, and the next morning fresh as a horse, never head a beter workout, really.

My anxiety melted away so fast while I was smoking it. After only two hits, I just felt great. The only thing about G13 that gets me, is it makes you hungry as hell, so have food ready lol”

“I absolutely love G13. It makes me so incredibly happy. I literally felt like I couldn't feel any emotion other than happiness while I was high. My anxiety melted away so fast while I was smoking it. After only two hits, I just felt great. The only thing about G13 that gets me, is it makes you hungry as hell, so have food ready lol”
“made me feel like i was swimming. its was bomb! its definetly a heavy hitter”
“Had gotten to the dispensary late, but it was all good because they where open. Friday! Good for smoking around and tinkering with things. Ready to go.”
“great strain for meical use”

“Had a few bong hits of this strain about 15 minutes ago. What i am feeling atm: Happy, talkative, relaxed, no more back pain, and i feel like a euphoric warm buzz in my shoulders and head. Head high is strong, but it also feels like a body high as well. So far so good. At this point i would recommend it, but as i previously mentioned, its only been an hour since i smoked it. Wait.........”

“This strain is off the chain. Using a 315w ceramic metal halide with large adjusta wing shade in a 3x3 tent I was able to produce 22ozs of dry bud. Couldn't believe it. And the thc % is off the charts. Highly highly recommend this strain.”

“An active high, had me running around the park like a 7 year old. Then put me to sleep. 
Ideal for wake and bakes”
“G13 haze is amazing haze strain nice lemony pine taste nice relaxing and energetic uplifting effect  very lovely  and great  weed”
“nice buzz”
“love love love!!!  taste like ginger cookies. mmm perfect working out for deep focus or locked on the couch playing video games. Definitely a must buy.”
“В небольших количествах прекрасно тонизирует и наполняет голову позитивом. Если слегка перебрать то размазывает и можно разучиться разговаривать.”
“Coool”
“G-13 was suck an awesome high blew me head of but in a happy and chilled out way bit zingy in mouth time to time but it was a good high in a long time”
“wow.”

“one of my friends grew g13 haze and even though he is a rookie and made mistakes during grow  it still turned out to be one of the best strains we have ever smoked. it hits hard and fast . definitely not for first timers!!.”
“This weed is very strong it doesn't take more than like 1 bowl to start feeling good and it doesn't make me act super odd either. the smoke tastes more woodsy and kinda like coffe”
“This crossed with nyc diesel is the best strain there is. No in depth review for this. Just a memory really. Triple cross i called it and it was the best ounce i ever bought”
“This G-13 haze is a sick high really recommend it if your used to smoking weed had a really happy high it was fucking awesome”

“Awesome strain that's versatile enough for both functional daytime high or evening relaxation. It provides a gentle head buzz that makes me feel good without sending me on an uncomfortable trip to outer space.”
“Great taste I also I was more relaxed afterwards”

“I have seen reviews of this strain that made me want try it. While the effects last long, I find this strain to be a bit harsh. I did like that it did give me pain relief and  the relief lasted about 4 hours.”
“These buds are tight and solid, much love to my budtender at Swell in Youngtown...They won't do you wrong cuz the flower speaks for itself!!”
“Heady, active, creative and chilled. Excellent strain for anybody suffering from depression or anxiety.”
“A truely great stain and such a nice high with a piney smell. A truely great strain would reccomend if you get the chance BUY IT”
“My new favorite. Keeps me happy and active.”
“great smelling heavy hitter. the buds are nice big and fluffy. if you have the opportunity to pick this up I would”
“Smoked a joint of this in Amsterdam back in 2009 sat in the big park there in Amsterdam mind blown for at least four hours.  Daily smoker but still kicked my arse.  Tastes so nice.”
“Bro this shit is lit”
“The 💣.”
“VERY interesting taste, a bit frosty. But no that strong, as I expected”
“shatter is delicious”
“Very strong and easy to grow. Smokes pungent with hints of fruit and tastes about the same. It’s very potent with an almost wine drunk feeling. Considerably one of my favorite strains!”
“nice calm buzz.”
“great hybrid for sleeping. you wont wake up like a zombie like most indica's. great stuff”

“This is my favorite strain for making music. It makes makes me so much more creative, and music feels so amazing. 
It makes me able to stay in the flow state for long enough to compose new tracks almost from start to finish in one go.”
“~Love this strain. Not to sure why it states that it can't be had in my location. It's gotten frequently in Michigan/Ohio!”
“This is good for the intermediate, and decent for the more experienced. smooth burn.”

“Surprisingly mellow for anything indica, but keeps the body relaxation.

Thought comes a bit more slowly, but seemingly more focused.

This is a great strain for relaxing in front of a tv, or hanging with friends.”
“Honestly, this stuff tastes great and smells wonderful, I just don't think the high works for me. It isn't terrible, there are just better strains out there.”
“One of the best strains imo🙏🏼”
“crazy white magic. Gandolf and Glenda ganging up on my  basal ganglia. I love it and I want G13 to have my babies.”

“G13 Haze has it all, perfect balance of bag appeal, aroma that's hard to beat along with truly amazing flavour notes with a good body and mind high. Some strains are stronger but but this is hard to beat all around. Perfect weed”
“Extremely clear headed high and amazing body high. Really uplifting as well. Great for when your stressed”

“I really loved this strain was able to get them in popcorn buds which are my favorite to consume. very pungent in smell. I smelled hints of mint at times and pine. smoke output was good. high is very heavy and I medicate frequently. def not a day time herb otherwise you might be napping on this one.”
“I think this has a very delicious taste! First all, I tasted the lemon as it blended into the earthy pine flavor!”
“So far the best strain I have ever tried. I favorited all the buds I have tried. It makes me cough a lot and it’s super pungent. 5 stars”
“My favorite strain 💚”

“Top drawer strain. 
Good, strong smoke. L aves you medicated for hours. 
Sky high, smile from ear to ear. I felt quite euphoric with this strain too, nothing could've brought me down from where I was ok this stuff 👌🏼👍🏼
BUY SOME”
“Had 1.2 grams of this in Amsterdam, really great flavour, really nice high.”
“Very giggly high, really good fun to smoke.”
“Wonderful daytime smoke!”
“Doesn't make you stoned but very happy and euphoric.”
“awesome strain. nice looking nugs very good high. good job mahalo!”
“Excellent strain in The Hague has a nice thc level and love smoking it”

“My favorite strain by far. This stuff truly puts you in a haze lol. I felt really energetic and productive on this, it's definitely not for you if you're looking for a crash-on-the-couch kind of high. It made me feel so happy, and I couldn't stop laughing. You cannot feel sad when you're high off of this. It's also good if you're smoking to get your appetite back, because this stuff makes you so unbelievably hungry”
“I smoke maybe 10 joints a day, strong strains and rarely get stoned like I used to when I was a teenager. Tonight I felt like a teenager again 😎”
“Excellent hybrid. Keeps you energetic for the night”

“A great hybrid. Good for just chilling at home by yourself, smoking with friends and going out too. Great head high, interesting thoughts and ideas flowing through my head. It's a good strain to explore your creative side too. Oh and it definitely helps with depression and anxiety. 

Also, I found that if I did something more active, the high would fade / I didn't feel it as much, while if I stayed focused on somethi...”
“Found it in MI Shelbyville to be exact. ...love the pepper and pine. ..huge buds dank nice jar appeal. ..nice to use at night. ..”

“Best strain i've ever smoked. Smoked it in Amsterdam which me and my friends picked up from Grey Area, mindblown. Even better than my favourite strain Super Silver Haze. Didn't even smoke alot, about 5-6 hits and i got in such a mellow high with my head soaring while my body felt like melted cheese, haha. Perfect strain for walking around in the city with your friends.”
“Absolutely high as fuck. DOPE strain”
“What I got was hybrid 50/50 and it was dank AF”
“Smoked a blunt of this on friday the 29th of July. At first it tasted sweet and zesty but 25 minutes after the fact I got a soar throat.”
“This strain has some kick!”
“great strain along with excellent service Im going to reccomend all my friends..goos job guys”

“Picked up at Prix in Amsterdam. Incredible strain. Delicious and smooth flavor and looks beautiful too. Does however give really bad cotton mouth tho. In the very beginning it gives a very uplifting feeling with a little bit of a dizziness or more of a head high. then about 30 min after smoking a .5G Joint the indica side hits and you get a little tired and sleepy especially if your laying or sitting down. But if you...”
“made me feel like i was swimming. its was bomb! its definetly a heavy hitter”
“good high”
“This strain gives you a very relaxed and lazy high. Definitely worth smoking again”
“Great strain. Very appealing and tasty. It's a heavy hitter even for a seasoned smoker. Enjoy :)”

“I actually wasn't crazy about this one, a lot of the haze crosses do nothing for me and I was actually looking for a pure g13 when I initially purchased so it might have swayed my rating a bit, but I find this strain makes me more talkative and gives me a lot of motivation to do a lot of house work, which I guess isn't a bad thing. The comedown is quick and hard and heavy though and it'll probably result in a late af...”
“Killer.”
“It was a really chill high for me. very relaxing. thumbs up for me.”
“Feeling floaty like edible type feeling”
“today smoke it and is very pretty high!”
